text: ESCP Business School is a European higher studies establishment. The school is in 3 places, in Paris, Reims, Rouen, France. It has been established in 2013.NEOMA Business School : naissance d'un nouveau "géant" des écoles de commerce made in France NEOMA is specialist in the fields of economics, social sciences and management. == References == == Further reading == * NEOMA website Category:2013 establishments in France Category:Education in France Category:Rouen Category:Reims Category:Universities in Paris
title: NEOMA Business School
